Detailed Description

ValidatorCollection defines the validators as set in the Response object. By adding validators to the response, this class instantiates several classes, each performing a specific type of validation. Also has methods to check the results of the validators.
Author:
Bas van Gaalen
Since:
1.0

ValidatorCollection.addValidator ( $  sValidator,
$  sType = ValidatorCollection::TYPE_RE 
)

Add a validator to the collection. Instantiates a specific class to handle the requested validation type.

Parameters:
$sValidator string Either the name of a validator or a string to be validated.
$sType string The validator type, defaults to Regular Expression.
